name: Tower Rescue (Ludum Dare 47)
description:
This is my submission to Ludum Dare 47!

It is kind of like Tower Defense except that it is Tower Destruction!

If I had enough time it would probably be the best it could be but I ran out unfortunately right before the deadline (or before I had no more time to work on it)

The theme for this Jam was Stuck in a Loop and I think that honestly, I did horribly

So if you like horribleness, play my game (ok maybe it wasn't THAT bad)

This game was made in Gdevelop.

https://gdevelop-app.com/
